roleset.name: generally large

example.name: big-j: both args
example.text: Up , and to the office , where all the morning busy , and so dined with my people at home , and then to the King?s playhouse , and there saw ? The Silent Woman ; ? the best comedy , I think , that ever was wrote ; and sitting by Shadwell the poet , he was big with admiration of it .

example.text: Hurry up , the world is very big !
